name: Shtone Hemge
description:
Shtone Hemge is now Monumental Failure

I'll leave the jam builds here for historical purposes, but updates will be found on the Monumental Failure page.

The gods are coming, you must construct a monument before the winter solstice.

Control groups of druids as they construct a monument for the ages, Shtone Hemge.

Keyboards and Controllers supported.

Get the high score! Tweet me your high score using #ShtoneHemge
